title: How to Make a Cotton Candy Martini

methods.name: Making a Pineapple Cotton Candy Martini

steps.headline: Consider filling a martini glass with a handful of cotton candy.
steps.description: The pineapple juice will already give this cocktail a sweet taste, but if you'd like something even sweeter, add a handful of cotton candy into the glass. Try to fill the glass up to the brim with cotton candy. Don't worry, the cotton candy will dissolve the instant you add the liquid.

steps.headline: Fill a cocktail shaker ¾ of the way with ice.
steps.description: This will help chill the martini.

steps.headline: Add in the vodka, juice, and grenadine.
steps.description: If you don't like pineapple juice, you can try another type of juice, such as cranberry.

steps.headline: Shake the ingredients for about 10 seconds.
steps.description: This will mix everything together as well as chill it.

steps.headline: Pour the mixture through a cocktail strainer into the glass.
steps.description: If you added any cotton candy into the glass, you'll see it disappear the moment the mixture touches it.

steps.headline: Garnish the drink with a pinch of cotton candy and serve.
steps.description: Try to balance the cotton candy on the rim of the glass, but don't let it touch the martini, or it will disappear. If you can't get it to balance, spear it onto a cocktail stick instead, and put the stick into the martini.

methods.name: Making a Cranberry Cotton Candy Martini

steps.headline: Fill a martini glass with a handful of cotton candy.
steps.description: Cranberry juice is usually tart, so this will help sweeten the cocktail. Don't worry if the cotton candy reaches the top of the glass. It will disappear once you add the liquids, and leave behind a sweet taste.

steps.headline: Fill a cocktail shaker ¾ of the way with ice.
steps.description: This will help chill the ingredients.

steps.headline: Add the vodka, liquor, and cranberry juice.
steps.description: If you aren't fond of cranberry juice, you can use another type of juice, such as grape or even orange.

steps.headline: Close the shaker and shake it for 10 seconds.
steps.description: This will mix everything together, as well as chill it.

steps.headline: Pour the mixture through a strainer over the cotton candy.
Garnish with a pinch of cotton candy and serve.
steps.description: If it won't stay still, spear it onto a cocktail stick, and place the stick into the martini.
